H0.text: How many male strippers perform on stage together in the 1997 film ‘The Full Monty’. 4

H1.text: How many male strippers perform on stage together in the 1997 film ‘The Full Monty’. 6 is excluded, so the next option is 5

H3.text: How many male strippers perform on stage together in the 1997 film ‘The Full Monty’. 6

A4.text: The film features six unemployed men forming a male striptease act.

A5.text: The cast allegedly agreed that all six of them would really do the 'full monty' strip at the end in front of 50 extras.
